title: Ronny Chieng's Chinatown Report & The Wave of Anti-Asian Racism - Beyond the Scenes
itunes:title: Ronny Chieng's Chinatown Report & The Wave of Anti-Asian Racism - Beyond the Scenes
description:
Ronny Chieng talks to Roy Wood Jr. about his viral response to a 2016 Fox News segment filled with racist Asian stereotypes and the rise in anti-Asian violence since then.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
